items.title: WATCH:  Paraglider survives nearly 500-foot fall into ocean
items.description: A paraglider survived a nearly 500-foot fall into the ocean off the coast of Florida, authorities say.

items.title: Teen suspect in Mississippi synagogue fire indicted on state hate crime charges
items.description: The suspect allegedly set the fire due to the building’s “Jewish ties,” the FBI said in a charging affidavit.

items.title: Some of the military options Trump could consider against Iran
items.description: The president's top national security advisers met Tuesday to consider action against Iran over its crackdown on protesters.
